= Details =
*[#English_version English version]

==目前可以得到的一些数据集汇总，我先抛砖引玉，希望大家提供更多的内容：==
  # movielens 数据集，官方提供下载：[http://www.grouplens.org/node/73 movielens数据集]
  # netflix数据集，目前官方不再提供下载，我的博客提供下载：[http://www.lifecrunch.biz/archives/207 netflix_dataset]
  # Jester数据集：这个数据集提供了4.1M的连续打分数据（分数从-10.00到+10.00）。这个数据集包含了73,421个用户对100个笑话的打分，这个数据集的特征是含有很少的item。下载地址：[http://www.ieor.berkeley.edu/~goldberg/jester-data/ Jester_dataset] This dataset contains 4.1 million continuous ratings (-10.00 to +10.00) of 100 jokes from 73,421 users; therefore it differentiates itself from other datasets by having a much smaller number of rateable items. 
  # yahoo music dataset，[http://kddcup.yahoo.com/datasets.php kdd_cup_dataset]
(1)track1:每个item至少有20个打分，每个user至少有10个打分
(2)track2:每个item至少有20个打分，每个user至少有17个打分
  #UCI Machine Learning Repository:[http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets.html UCI datasets]
  #amazon-meta dataset: [http://snap.stanford.edu/data/amazon-meta.html Amazon product co-purchasing network metadata]
  #yahoo提供的dataset，但是要申请，而且处理比较慢，我11年4月6日提交了请求，目前还没有反馈(13号已获得反馈）[http://webscope.sandbox.yahoo.com/ yahoo sandbox dataset]

= English version =
==There are some datasets available for public now and welcome you to provide more==
  # movielens dataset, offical download: [http://www.grouplens.org/node/73 movielens dataset]
  # netflix dataset, is not available on the netflix website but provided in my blog: [http://www.lifecrunch.biz/archives/207 netflix_dataset]

  # yahoo music dataset，[http://kddcup.yahoo.com/datasets.php kdd_cup_dataset]
(1)track1: An item has at least 20 ratings in the total dataset and Each user has at least 10 ratings in the training data,
(2)track2: An item has at least 20 ratings in the total dataset (including train and test sets), and each user has at least 17 ratings in the training data.
  #UCI Machine Learning Repository:[http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets.html UCI datasets]
